description: Sent when a new 15 minute interval log file is
available.

event.Summary: New 15 minute interval log file $v2 created

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD LUM-PM-MIB::pmFileAdded LUM-PM-MIB::pmFileIndex u 1 LUM-PM-MIB::pmFileName s EXAMPLE LUM-PM-MIB::pmFileCreatedTime s EXAMPLEE LUM-PM-MIB::pmFileSeqNumber c 9999

description: A number which identifies the interval for which
the set of statistics is available.
The interval identified by 1 is the most recently
completed interval, and the interval identified
by N is the interval immediately preceding the
one identified by N-1.
variables.name: LUM-PM-MIB::pmFileIndex

description: The name of the file.
variables.name: LUM-PM-MIB::pmFileName

description: The time when the file was created.
variables.name: LUM-PM-MIB::pmFileCreatedTime

description: The last sequence number used when issuing
a notification for this file.
variables.name: LUM-PM-MIB::pmFileSeqNumber

description: Sent when a new 24 hour interval log file is
available.

event.Summary: New 24 hour interval log file $v2 created

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD LUM-PM-MIB::pmFile24hAdded LUM-PM-MIB::pmFile24hIndex u 1 LUM-PM-MIB::pmFile24hName s EXAMPLE LUM-PM-MIB::pmFile24hCreatedTime s EXAMPLEE LUM-PM-MIB::pmFile24hSeqNumber c 9999

description: A number which identifies the interval for which
the set of statistics is available.
The interval identified by 1 is the most recently
completed interval, and the interval identified
by N is the interval immediately preceding the
one identified by N-1.
variables.name: LUM-PM-MIB::pmFile24hIndex

description: The name of the file.
variables.name: LUM-PM-MIB::pmFile24hName

description: The time when the file was created.
variables.name: LUM-PM-MIB::pmFile24hCreatedTime

description: The last sequence number used when issuing
a notification for this file.
variables.name: LUM-PM-MIB::pmFile24hSeqNumber
